release.en-GB: - Better reordering of currencies - iOS look for iPhone, Android look for Android
- Translations for Swedish and Japanese - Faster animations
release.ja-JP: - 日本語バージョン追加 - 表示速度改善

release.en-GB: First app release! With support for 250 countries and 168 currencies.
release.ja-JP: 初めてのリーリス！２５０国と１６８関数スポート。
